BasicAuth.name: HTTP
BasicAuth.description: This security scheme uses the standard HTTP Basic Auth authorization flow.

get.description: This endpoint device infomation owned by a user.

200.description: Contains an object with a Basic Authentication header request.

500.description: An error due to an internal server error.

x-code-samples.source:
curl --location --request GET 'https://resources.globiots.com/rest/api/public/v2/devices/host-name/{hostname}' \ 
--header 'Authorization: Basic Basic $(echo -n YOUR_APP_KET:YOUR_SECRET_KET | base64)'

x-code-samples.source:

--header 'Authorization: Basic $(echo -n YOUR_APP_KET:YOUR_SECRET_KET | base64)' \ 
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ 
--data-raw '{ 
    "0000016F": ["6000","6002"], 
    "000001BB": ["6000","6002"] 
}'

parameters.description: start point get data, yyyyMMddHHmmss format (GMT + 0).

parameters.description: end point get data, yyyyMMddHHmmss format (GMT + 0).
